introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to Hack the Hill! We’re excited to announce that applications for the first round are now open. This hackathon is a fantastic opportunity to challenge yourself, collaborate with peers, and unleash your creativity in a vibrant and dynamic environment. We are eager to consider applicants who demonstrate a keen interest in technology and innovation. This is your chance to show off your skills, learn from others, and potentially create something extraordinary.

preferredLanguage.title: Preferred Language
preferredLanguage.description: Please select your preferred language for the application form.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: To identify and contact you about your application status and event updates, we’ll be collecting personal information. Rest assured, your data will be handled with the utmost confidentiality and care.

demographics.title: Demographic Information
demographics.description: To help us understand trends in our hackathon attendance and improve future events, we are collecting demographic information. Please note that your responses to these questions will not impact the evaluation of your application.

education.title: Education and Professional Information
education.description: Please provide details about your post-secondary education and, if applicable, your professional career.

educationLevel.label: Which level of formal education are you currently enrolled in/completing?

major.label: What is your major/primary area of study? If you already graduated, what was your major/primary area of study?

skillsAccomplishments.title: Skills and Accomplishments
skillsAccomplishments.description: Now's your chance to shine! We’re gathering background information to help you highlight your skills and accomplishments. While technical proficiency is important, please note that it doesn't guarantee acceptance into the hackathon.

hackathonBefore.label: Have you participated in a hackathon before?

hackathonDetails.label: If yes, please provide details for each, including the name of the event, the projects you worked on, and the outcomes.

programmingLanguagesTechnologies.label: What programming languages and technologies are you proficient in?

projectDescription.label: Describe a project you’ve worked on that you’re particularly proud of (provide a link if available)

participationReason.label: Why do you want to participate in this hackathon?

learningGoals.label: What do you hope to achieve or learn from this event?

emergencyContact.title: Emergency Contact
emergencyContact.description: In case of an emergency, we need to know who to contact. Please provide the following information.

logistics.title: Logistics
logistics.description: Hope you're still with us! We have a few additional questions regarding food and travel logistics.

dietaryRestrictions.label: If you have any dietary restrictions/allergies, please select them below:

specialAccommodations.label: Do you require any special accommodations to participate?

additionalInfo.label: Is there anything else you would like us to know about you?

travelOrigin.label: Where will you be traveling from to attend Hack the Hill, if located outside Ottawa (City, country)?

travelAccommodations.label: Would you like to use Hack the Hill’s travel accommodations? If so, please select one of the following locations for transportation arrangements. If you are not from Ottawa or any of these locations, you may need to arrange your travel:

referral.label: How did you hear about this hackathon?

options.onlineForums: Online Forums or Groups (e.g. Reddit, Discord)

agreements.title: Agreements and Consents
agreements.description: We're almost there! All that's left is to review and agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read and check the boxes below to acknowledge your agreement.

hthAgreements.label: I agree to the Hack the Hill <0>Code of Conduct</0>, <1>Privacy Policy</1>, <2>Terms of Service</2>, <3>Liability Release Waiver</3>, and <4>Media Release Waiver</4>.

hthPromotions.label: I authorize Hack the Hill to send me emails about upcoming events and opportunities.

mlhCodeOfConduct.label: I have read and agree to the <0>MLH Code of Conduct</0>.

mlhPrivacyTerms.label: I authorize you to share my application/registration information with Major League Hacking for event administration, ranking, and MLH administration in line with the <0>MLH Privacy Policy</0>. I further agree to the terms of the <1>MLH Contest Terms and Conditions</1>.

mlhPromotions.label: I authorize MLH to send me occasional emails about relevant events, career opportunities, and community announcements.
